bike.description: 6061 aluminum triple gauge main tubes w/hydro-formed top tube, sloping design for menJAMIS_SINGLEQUOTEs, step through design for ladies, replaceable derailleur hanger, eyeleted dropouts

components.description: RST NEON-PLS-T suspension, coil spring & MCU, mechanical lock out, 60mm travel
Alex ID-19 double wall alloy rims with GSW sidewall, 36H, Formula alloy hubs with QR and 14g stainless steel spokes
Vittoria Adventure with Solid Shielding puncture protection and reflective sidewall, 700 x 35c (ETRTO 37mm)
Shimano Acera RD-M360 rear and Shimano FD-M191 front, 31.8mm, top swing/dual pull front.
Comfort platform style with TPE non-slip insert
Comfort hi-rise, steel, 25.4 x 80mm rise x 15JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 640mm
Jamis alloy angle-adjustable, 90mm with 150mm quill (14–17"), 110mm with 180mm quill (18–23")
Anatomic triple density kraton grip with end plug
Suspension alloy micro-adjust, 27.2 x 350mm with alloy clamp and QR seatpin. 300mm for MenJAMIS_SINGLEQUOTEs 15, 17, Step-Thru 14
Jamis Comfort with memory foam, synthetic suede cover, burnished sides and bumper springs with satin steel rails, gender specific
Tektro forged alloy linear-pull brakes with front power modulator and Tektro CL530 ergonomic designed alloy brake levers with kraton insert
